PALS Peer Support Check-in online appointments are available to all enrolled SCU students, Monday to Friday, 5.30pm or 6.00pm AEST (QLD) time.
Because PALS Mentors are students just like you, they understand your study challenges and have some great solutions to help keep you on track. PALS Mentors can help with your assessment preparation, understanding rubrics and referencing, planning and time management.
Reach out if you are feeling stuck or isolated in your studies and get study help from a fellow student. Simply book a PALS Peer Support Check-in on your preferred day and time by clicking on this link
